nodes.name: Init
Set channel parameters
calculate virtual values
Set LED value on bridge
set error
Set log file name
nodes.func:
msg.logfile = "bridge-" + env.get("NR_FLOW_NAME") + ".log"

return msg;

nodes.name: send virtual data
Set init image
Subscribe to commands for this bridge
Error
nodes.func:
node.warn("The bridge configuration is wrong!")
node.done()

selectedJimpFunction.name: resize
selectedJimpFunction.description: resize the image. One of the w or h parameters can be set to automatic ("Jimp.AUTO" or -1).

parameters.name: w
parameters.hint: the width to resize the image to (or "Jimp.AUTO" or -1)

parameters.name: h
parameters.hint: the height to resize the image to (or "Jimp.AUTO" or -1)

selectedJimpFunction.name: composite
selectedJimpFunction.description: composites another Jimp image over this image at x, y

parameters.name: x
parameters.hint: the x position to blit the image

parameters.name: y
parameters.hint: the y position to blit the image

nodes.name: send bridge data
Set number data point values
Set boolean data point values
Set sensor value on bridge
Write data
prepare write data
Round values
SPS Error
Set value
Parse GPS
GPS Error
Set Static value on bridge
Clock Toolbar - Summary
nodes.format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">
    $('#text0').remove();
    $('#div0').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    var div0 = $('<div/ id="div0">');
    var p0 = $('<p/ id="text0">');
    p0.text("Lad. : UNB.");
    div0.append(p0);
    div0[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';

    $('#text1').remove();
    $('#div1').remove();
    var toolbar1 = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    var div1 = $('<div/ id="div1">');
    var p1 = $('<p/ id="text1">');
    p1.text("Bat. : UNB.");
    div1.append(p1);
    div1[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';

    $('#logoId').remove();
    var div5 = $('<div/ id="logoId">');
    var p5 = new Image();
    p5.src = 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'
    p5.height = 40;
    div5[0].style.margin = 'auto 10px auto auto';
    div5.append(p5);
    
    function displayText0(text) {
        p0.text("Lad. : " + text);
    }
    function displayText1(lh) {
        p1.text("Bat. : " + text);
    }
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
            if(data["LADUNG"]){
                displayText0(data["LADUNG"]);
            }
            if(data["BATTERIE"]){
                displayText1(data["BATTERIE"]);
            }
        });
    })(scope);
    
    toolbar.append(div0);
    toolbar.append(div1);
    toolbar.append(div5);
</script>
